content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 1 ** ** there s a pdf pattern in english which provides an easy to follow step-by-step crochet instructions and a detailed photo tutorial ** about the pattern leen s corner to corner blanket is crocheted from corner to corner using wattle stitch with added bean stitches to create beautiful diagonal braided lines across the blanket for a unique texture the blanket can be worked both as a square or as a rectangle and can be made as big as you d like the corner to corner crochet method is my favorite way of working blankets it gives you the flexibility to decide the finished measurements of your work as you go stitches used in this different c2c blanket pattern bean st double_crochet single_crochet chain skill level - easy crochet terminology - the pattern is written using english u s terminology materials needed - hooks size needed 5 0 mm / h - the blanket is crocheted with worsted #4 weight yarn - total amount of yarn needed rectangle - 700gr/1 131m/1 237yds square - 800 gr/1 293m/1 414yds - additional materials needed 2 stitch markers optional finished size - can be made in any size you want square - 35x35 89x89cm rectangle - 30x35 76x89cm if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2025 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the design photos and video in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final this pdf pattern is free from viruses and safe to use it includes links to reputable websites however users should exercise caution when accessing external links from unknown sources gpsr representative ciara doyle c15 y5f9 ireland ciara@thefairythorn ie 1 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
